thread.title: GOP hopeful Kasich offers ambitious balanced-budget plan
thread.title_full: GOP hopeful Kasich offers ambitious balanced-budget plan - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Steve Peoples, Associated Press
title: GOP hopeful Kasich offers ambitious balanced-budget plan
text: Photo: Jim Cole, AP Republican presidential candidate, Ohio Gov. John Kasich announces his federal budget plan, Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, at Nashua Community College in Nashua, N.H. Republican presidential candidate, Ohio Gov. John Kasich announces... NASHUA, N.H. (AP) — Republican presidential candidate John Kasich on Thursday pledged to balance the budget within eight years, cut taxes and pour more money into the military, while holding the line on all other government spending. Republican presidential candidate, Ohio Gov. John Kasich announces his federal budget plan, Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, at Nashua Community College in Nashua, N.H. Republican presidential candidate, Ohio Gov. John Kasich announces... NASHUA, N.H. (AP) — Republican presidential candidate John Kasich on Thursday pledged to balance the budget within eight years, cut taxes and pour more money into the military, while holding the line on all other government spending.
